mapper.select: SELECT ds.id ,u.caps_name ,(select name from code_data where group_key='DEPT' and code=u.dept_cd and use_yn='Y') as dept_name ,st_dt ,week_name ,holiday_yn ,convert(varchar(5),go_tm,114) as go_tm ,convert(varchar(5),out_tm,114) as out_tm ,convert(varchar(5),late_tm,114) as late_tm ,convert(varchar(5),exp_out_tm,114) as exp_out_tm ,cal_work_tm_min ,work_tm_min ,st_leave ,st_hl_leave ,st_offcial ,st_short_late ,st_long_late ,st_fail_work_tm ,st_absence ,st_adjust ,memo ,data_error_yn ,(select caps_name from ks_user where id=ds.crtd_id) as crtd_id ,ds.crtd_dt FROM ks_daily_stat ds, ks_user u where ds.id=u.id and st_dt =#{searchDt} and ds.id=#{searchUser}

select isnull(availCount,0) as availCount ,isnull(usedLeave,0) as usedLeave ,isnull(usedHlLeave,0) as usedHlLeave ,(isnull(usedLeave,0)+isnull(usedHlLeave,0)) as usedCount ,isnull(currReplace,0) as currReplace from ( select (select avail_count from ks_annual where id=#{id} and year=#{searchYear}) as availCount, (select count(le_dt) from ( select le_dt from ks_leave where crtd_id=#{id} and offcial='N' and year=#{searchYear} group by le_dt ) a) as usedLeave, (select count(hl_dt)*0.5 from ( select hl_dt from ks_half_leave where crtd_id=#{id} and offcial='N' and year=#{searchYear} group by hl_dt ) b) as usedHlLeave, (select month_replace_count - (select count(distinct repl_dt) from ks_replace where crtd_id=#{id} and convert(varchar(7), repl_dt, 120) =convert(varchar(7), getdate(), 120)) from ks_daily_rule where getdate() between apply_start_dt and apply_end_dt) as currReplace ) score

select isnull(subShort,0) as subShort ,isnull(subLong,0) as subLong ,isnull(subFailTm,0) as subFailTm ,isnull(subAbsence,0) as subAbsence ,isnull(FLOOR((1/convert(float, short_late_count)*subShort)+(1/convert(float, long_late_count)*subLong)),0) as sublate from
( select sum(st_short_late) as subShort ,sum(st_long_late) as subLong ,sum(st_fail_work_tm) as subFailTm ,sum(st_absence) as subAbsence from ks_daily_stat where id=#{id} and st_year=#{searchYear} and st_adjust='N' ) a, ( select * from ks_yearly_rule where apply_year=#{searchYear} ) b

select ku.id ,#{value} as year ,isnull(wp.short_late_sum,0) as short_late_sum ,isnull(wp.long_late_sum,0) as long_late_sum ,isnull(wp.org_late_point,0) as org_late_point ,isnull(FLOOR(wp.org_late_point),0) as late_point ,isnull(klp.short_late,0) as klp_short_late ,isnull(klp.long_late,0) as klp_long_late ,isnull(klp.org_late_point,0) as klp_org_late_point ,klp.late_point as klp_late_point ,isnull(klp.mail_count,0) as klp_mail_count ,convert(varchar(16),klp.last_mail_send_dt,120) as klp_last_mail_send_dt from ks_user ku left outer join ( select kds.id ,kds.short_late_sum ,kds.long_late_sum ,kyr.short_late_weight ,kyr.long_late_weight ,(kds.short_late_sum*kyr.short_late_weight + kds.long_late_sum*kyr.long_late_weight) as org_late_point from ( select id ,sum(st_short_late) as short_late_sum ,sum(st_long_late) as long_late_sum from ks_daily_stat where st_year=#{value} and st_adjust='N' group by id) kds , ks_yearly_rule kyr where kyr.apply_year=#{value} ) wp on ku.id=wp.id left outer join (select * from ks_late_point where year=#{value} ) klp on ku.id=klp.id where ku.auth_cd <>'003' and ku.state_cd='001'
